actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to suspend for a three-year period the duty on a 3-((Hydroxydiphenylacetyl)oxy)-1, 1-dimethylpiperidinium bromide.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, for three years, the duty on 3-(Hydroxydiphenylacetyl)oxy)-1,1-dimethylpiperidinium bromide.

titles.title: A bill to suspend for a three-year period the duty on a 3-((Hydroxydiphenylacetyl)oxy)-1, 1-dimethylpiperidinium bromide.
